meanings.definition: An area of high or mountainous land.
meanings.sent1: The highlands were covered in snow during the winter.
meanings.sent2: People love to hike in the highlands to enjoy the beautiful views.
meanings.sent3: The highlands decided to play hide and seek with the valleys.
meanings.sent4: The highlands stood tall like giants against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The highlands were like a crown on the landscape.

meanings.definition: The elevated part of a country.
meanings.sent1: Living in the highlands means cooler temperatures in the summer.
meanings.sent2: Farmers in the highlands grow crops that thrive in the altitude.
meanings.sent3: The highlands challenged the lowlands to a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: The highlands were the guardians of the nation, watching over all.
meanings.sent5: The highlands were a beacon of hope in the country.
